address_provider.description: Contract used to query addresses related to red-bank (MARS Token)

deposit_window.description: Number of seconds for which lockup deposits will be accepted

init_timestamp.description: Timestamp till when deposits can be made

lockdrop_incentives.description: Total MARS lockdrop incentives to be distributed among the users

ma_ust_token.description: maUST token address - Minted upon UST deposits into red bank

withdrawal_window.description: Number of seconds for which lockup withdrawals will be allowed
